You are now dead! You have been hidden from other players and are now capable of flying.
You are an innocent! But beware, there are traitors lurking about, yearning to fill you with bullets.
You are a traitor! Your job is to kill all of the innocents. But beware, you are outnumbered. You'll need cleverness and agility if you are to win this.
You may not drop items while in a game!

You are a detective! You have been equipped with a DNA scanner which will allow you to take DNA samples from bodies in order to find the killer. Use this device to your advantage to eliminate the traitors!

Pre-0.5 data folder ("Trouble In Terrorist Town") detected. This will be automatically renamed to "TTT." However, it will need to be manually changed back if you wish to switch back to a pre-0.5 version.
An error occurred while renaming the data folder. You may need to do this manually.
You are already in this round!

Invalid lobby sign! Type /ttt help lobby for help.
Failed to save lobby sign to disk

We have detected that you are running a prerelease build of TTT. If there is a newer release available, we highly recommend updating to that. If not, please report any bugs you find in this build to the plugin author.
Creates an arena by the specified name. Three coordinates and optionally a world may be provided. If no extra arguments are provided, the sender's location will be used.
Adds a spawn to the specified arena. Three coordinates and optionally a world may be provided. If no extra arguments are provided, the sender's location will be used.

Removes a spawn from the specified arena. Three coordinates and optionally a world may be provided. If no extra arguments are provided, the sender's location will be used. A single index may also be used.
You must be in the same world as the arena!
An internal error occured while performing the requested task.
This version of TTT requires MGLib version 0.3.0 or higher. You can download and install it from http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/mglib/. Note that TTT will not function without it!
Ban time must be a number!
